narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Cook Children's Physician Network is a Medical Genetics, Clinical Genetics (M.D.) provider based in Fort Worth, TX. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $106.2M in Medicaid payments across 2.7M claims serving 0 beneficiaries.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: This provider received $106.2M in taxpayer-funded Medicaid payments — enough to fund healthcare for approximately 13,275 Medicaid beneficiaries for a full year at average per-enrollee costs.
